name: infeq1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2))
bodyPretty: ⊢ inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c3))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp(inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2), c0 = c3)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2)
⊣ c0 = c3
⊣ (c0 = c3 → inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2)
⊣ c0 = c3
⊣ (c0 = c3 → inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), cinf(c3, c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ inf(c0, c1, c2)= inf(c3, c1, c2)
⊣ c0 = c3

comment: Equality inference for infimum. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2020.)
